inclusion.criterion: Steroid Refractory aGvHD after Bone marrow transplant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prophylactic GvHD therapy with cyclosporine, tacrolimus, MMF, or sirolimus can be continued.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with late onset acute GvHD will be eligible
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients should have an absolute neutrophil count (ANC) of >500µL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with renal dysfunction or veno-occlusive disease are eligible
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient should not be getting any other experimental therapy for aGvHD
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with active uncontrolled life threatening infection (s) from viral, bacterial, fungal or other organisms will be excluded.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with HIV infection will be excluded
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are pregnant, breast feeding, or if sexually active and unwilling to use effective birth control for the duration of this study will be excluded
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with NYHA Class III or IV heart failure will be excluded
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 22yo F otherwise healthy with a 5 yr history of systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia concerning for another flare. She responded well to IV steroids and diphenydramine.
